author: Trish Deseine
method: Put the beetroot in a mini food processor and blend until finely chopped. Transfer to a bowl and mix in all the remaining ingredients except the vegetable chips. Season with salt and black pepper. Serve with vegetable chips for dipping.
ingredients: 1 cooked (not pickled) beetroot, peeled,  500g/1lb 2oz plain Greek-style yoghurt,  1 lemon, juice only,  handful fresh dill,  2 tbsp chopped fresh mint leaves,  2 tbsp finely chopped cucumber,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  vegetable chips, for dipping
